channel.title: Cache issue could be easy fix?
channel.description:
Okay, I downloaded a client and source a few days ago and was looking around to change the loading screen. As I was having issues locating the cache. I came to realize it was in the client folder. I moved it to the "c:/" drive and when I tried to load the client it gave me an error of "Error loading please report."
So i'm getting the expression that the cache only loads in the client folder. Does anyone know how to change it to load in the c:/ drive?

item.title: Cache issue could be easy fix?
item.dc:creator: @killerkody killerkody

@killerkody wrote:

Okay, I downloaded a client and source a few days ago and was looking around to change the loading screen. As I was having issues locating the cache. I came to realize it was in the client folder. So i’m getting the expression that the cache only loads in the client folder. Does anyone know how to change it to load in the c:/ drive?
